TopicTitle: Changing the part of your space craft that the camera centers on?

Articles.Content: How is this done? When I first started playing I seem to remember it would center around the cockpit and any movement you would make would revolve around the cockpit. This made sense to me and I liked it that way. Somewhere along the way, however, I've managed to shift the view to centering over the middle of my craft (I think it's center of mass but not sure). It's usually just in the 'middle' though which is frustrating for longer crafts. How can I fix this? I've tried the 'control from here' button but that doesn't do anything. Middle mouse button doesn't do it. Can't find anything in the key bindings nor on Google that addresses this problem. Anyone know?
Middle mouse only works when you drag it, similar to changing the rotation. There's no way that I'm aware of to change the default location.

The view centers around the CoM (or something very close to it). I don't believe this can be changed in stock (not sure if there's a mod).

What you can do though is the middle mouse button (as mentioned). Click and drag changes the angle of the camera. However, it doesn't reset the "centered on part."
Press V to change the view. My favourite view is FREE.
